field.name: eno_question
field.labeldesc: Have any E & O claims been made during the past five years against the agency, agency partners, officers, or any members of the staff?

field.name: member_of_hba
field.labeldesc: Are you a member of an HBA?

field.name: entity_gen_det_hba_dropdown
field.labeldesc: If Yes, please select the HBA Chapter you are a member of

field.name: reason_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select master_lookup_data_id, master_lookup_data_desc from master_lookup_data_lku where master_lookup_detail_id in(select master_lookup_detail_id from master_lookup_detail_lku where lookup_table_name='agency_termination_reason_lku')

field.name: co_op_ad_dollar_spent
field.labeldesc: Co-Op Advertising dollar amount spent YTD
